title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements by gathering input from stakeholders and subject matter experts.

title: System Architecture Design
description:
Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points. Consider scalability, security, and performance for large-scale log data processing. To ensure a robust design, explore distributed systems, machine learning, and real-time processing capabilities. In addition, outline strategies for handling various data types (structured and unstructured), ensuring privacy, and maintaining system efficiency. To achieve an effective design, collaborate with relevant team members such as data scientists, security experts, system administrators, and frontend/backend developers during the design process.

For the design to be approved, incorporate feedback from code-architect, project-manager, and security-specialist in the next draft. Once feedback is addressed, update the rfc_state field to 'APPROVED'.

title: Data Ingestion and Preprocessing
description: Design and implement the components responsible for ingesting and preprocessing log data from various sources.

title: Log Correlation Engine
description: Design and implement the core log correlation engine that identifies patterns and potential security incidents.

title: Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management components for storing and managing log data and correlation results.

title: User Interface and Reporting
description: Design and implement the user interface and reporting components for visualizing and analyzing correlation results.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Design and implement security measures, including authentication, authorization, and data encryption.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Deployment and Monitoring
description: Plan and implement the deployment strategy, including infrastructure provisioning, continuous integration, and monitoring.

title: Documentation and User Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation and develop user training materials for the LogCorrelationEngine system.
